Articles.Content:
Anyone know where these are stored? Clearly they are stored somewhere, and written to the .craft file on saving:

PART
{
	part = probeCoreOcto2_4293017764
	partName = Part
	[B]pos = 0.03663391,14.71699,-0.04683471[/B]
...

I've scoured the API but can't seem to find them anywhere. Basically I'm trying to find a way to get the position vector between the two part origins, and having the two positions in global coordinates like in the craft file would let me simply subtract them and find this. Anybody have some insight?

Part.transform.position is the position relative to the world

Part.transform.local position is the position relative to the parent part.

Part.transform.position is the position relative to the world

Part.transform.local position is the position relative to the parent part.

Exactly what I needed, thank you very much.
